Text: Thank you very much!! This torrent allowed me to fill quite a few holes in my collection. No Pun Intended!
Many of the files are corrupted and cannot be opened. Is anyone else having this problem?

Just found this torrent. I've been looking for the Cover to Cover Hard drive data for a while now. I own the Cover to Cover Box sets for the 50's and the 60's. A few years ago Torrents were going around for those box sets. Would those old Torrents complete your collection ? Could we end up with 1 Large Torrent that has every page from every Playboy 1953 to say 2010 ??? Sorry for the long comment just brain storming.

One of the most important torrents ever created!  Outstanding work!!
Will this torrent be updated with more complete issues?  I do love the pictorals, but I would like to have all the articles and stories as well.
